name: Elixir
description: Elixir is a modular DPoS network built to power orderbook liquidity The Elixir Network is a new primitive, built from the ground up to power liquidity across orderbook exchanges, enabling users to deploy liquidity to pairs and exchanges to build trustless products to enhance their liquidity. Elixir was founded in February of 2022, and has since raised over $10m from names including Hack VC, Arthur Hayes, FalconX, NGC Ventures, Angelist Ventures, and more with the latest fundraise being a Series A at a $100m valuation. Elixir is a full time team of 20+ based in New York City.
